name: Endless Dungeon (randomnovice)
description:
Please note: This title is currently released for MAC only.

Endless Dungeon is a top-down 2D dungeon crawler game with a multitude of different enemies to fight, spells to unlock and weapons and armour to find.

Features

  • An endless number of randomly generated levels
  • Fight against a vast array of dangerous creatures
  • Gain experience and level up your character with four different attributes: strength, dexterity, constitution and intelligence
  • Use melee and ranged weapons, equip armour to defend yourself and discover items hidden deep below
  • Cast spells with four different spell schools to choose from: light, elements, alteration and shadow
  • Detect and dodge traps
  • Buy and sell equipment at shops
  • And much more!

Made using LÖVE2D.

This title is in development with future features to be added.
